TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_bgayaw, title = bgayaw, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/bgayaw} }

S.FORM: bgayaw galan nha' qu bgayaw hiya' ma. mutu wahan maniq na bzyok qnhyun qu bway na bgayaw. sraral hiya' ga, ssabu' ta' nniqun qu abaw bgayaw.
